title-group.article-title: THREE WAY DECOMPOSITION FOR THE BOLTZMANN EQUATION

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright 2009 AMSS, Chinese Academy of Sciences

abstract.p: The initial value problem for the spatially homogeneous Boltzmann equation is considered. A deterministic numerical scheme for this problem is developed by the use of the three way decomposition of the unknown function as well as of the collision integral. On this way, almost linear complexity of the algorithm is achieved. Some numerical examples are presented.
